title: Part 731 - Rules of Practice for the Appellate Terms
content:
Part 731 - Rules of Practice for the Appellate Terms

State Regulations
§ 731.1 - Court sessions
§ 731.2 - Filing of notice of appeal and request for Appellate Term action
§ 731.3 - Civil Appeals Management Program
§ 731.4 - Calendar of appeals
§ 731.5 - Preferences; consolidation
§ 731.6 - Calendar of appeals; preferences; consolidation
§ 731.7 - Time, number and manner of filing appeals; extensions of time
§ 731.8 - Dismissals on the court's own motion; enlargements of time
§ 731.9 - Appeals in criminal cases; adjournments; extensions of time
§ 731.10 - Leave to appeal to the Appellate Term
§ 731.11 - Motions to reargue, resettle or amend; motions for leave to appeal to the Appellate Division
§ 731.12 - Motions to reargue, resettle or amend; motions for leave to appeal to the Appellate Division
§ 731.13 - Stay of judgment pending appeal to the Appellate Term for the Ninth and Tenth Judicial Districts
§ 731.14 - Decisions and orders; costs
§ 731.15 - Review of certain protective orders issued pursuant to CPL 245.70

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
